# Layout Functions Complete reference for Vista's layout control functions. ## Layout Containers - **across**: Arrange children horizontally - **below**: Arrange children vertically - **row**: Row layout container - **col**: Column layout container - **grid**: Grid layout container ## Layout Control - **spacing**: Set space between children - **padding**: Set internal padding - **margin**: Set external margin - **align**: Set horizontal alignment - **valign**: Set vertical alignment ## Positioning - **origin**: Set origin position - **offset**: Set offset position - **size**: Set component size ## Nesting - **scope**: Create isolated layout scope - **panel**: Create panel container - **group**: Create group container ## See Also - [Layout](/wiki/core/layout/) - Layout documentation - [Component Functions](/wiki/core/api-reference/component-functions/) - Component reference
